Properties.string: Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.
Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.

Properties.ProtectedString:
--Scripted by TakeoHonorable
--Forecast is nothing but SHEER COLD!
function Create(ty) return function(data) local obj = Instance.new(ty) for k, v in pairs(data) do if type(k) == 'number' then v.Parent = obj else obj[k] = v end end return obj end end
local Tool = script.Parent Tool.Enabled = true
local Seed = Random.new()
local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
local FrostSparkles = Handle:WaitForChild("FrostSparkles") FrostSparkles.Enabled = true
local Sounds = { Equip = Handle:WaitForChild("Equip"), Swing = Handle:WaitForChild("Swing"), IceCrack = Handle:WaitForChild("IceCrack"), --Shatter = Handle:WaitForChild("Shatter") }
local Remote = (Tool:FindFirstChildOfClass("RemoteEvent") or Create("RemoteEvent"){ Name = "Remote", Parent = Tool })
local Animations = {}
local Events = {}
local Player,Character,Center
local Services = { Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), TweenService = (game:FindService("TweenService") or game:GetService("TweenService")), RunService = (game:FindService("RunService") or game:GetService("RunService")), Debris = (game:FindService("Debris") or game:GetService("Debris")), ServerScriptService = (game:FindService("ServerScriptService") or game:GetService("ServerScriptService")) }
function PlantIceStalagmite(Position) local StalagmiteScript = script:WaitForChild("StalagmiteScript"):Clone() StalagmiteScript.Parent = Services.ServerScriptService
Create("Vector3Value"){ Name = "Pos", Value = Position, Parent = StalagmiteScript }
Create("ObjectValue"){ Name = "Creator", Value = Character, Parent = StalagmiteScript }
StalagmiteScript.Disabled = false -- Go get em' tiger! end
function GetHumanoidsInRange(CenterPos,Range)--Returns all non-teammate humanoids that are alive
local CapHum = {}
local world = workspace
local Vec3 = Vector3.new
local Region = Region3.new
local FindPartsInRegion = world.FindPartsInRegion3WithIgnoreList --Micro-optimization techniques C:
local Neg,Pos = CenterPos - Vec3(1,1,1) * (Range*.5), CenterPos + Vec3(1,1,1) * (Range*.5)
local Parts = FindPartsInRegion(world,Region(Neg,Pos),{Character},math.huge) --Always specify the original object to call the function
for i=1,#Parts do
if Parts[i] and (Parts[i].Position-CenterPos).Magnitude <= Range then --It's within range
local Hum,FF = Parts[i].Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid"),Parts[i].Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("ForceField")
if Hum and not FF and Hum.Parent and Hum.Health ~= 0 and not IsTeamMate(Player,Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent)) and not IsInTable(CapHum,Hum) then
CapHum[#CapHum+1] = Hum
end
end
end
return CapHum end
local Abilities = { [Enum.KeyCode.Q] = { Ready = true, Reload = 35, Function = function() --warn("Activated Ice Stalagmites") FrostSparkles.Enabled = false Animations.Summon:Play(nil,nil,2.5) Sounds.IceCrack:Play()
wait(1.5)
local TargetHums = GetHumanoidsInRange(Center.Position,180) local world = workspace local Vec3 = Vector3.new local FindPartOnRay = world.FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList local ray = Ray.new
local MaxHeightFromGround = 100
for i=1,#TargetHums do if TargetHums[i] and TargetHums[i].Parent then local Torso = TargetHums[i].Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") or TargetHums[i].Parent:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso")
if Torso then --Secondary check to see if the target is at enough height from the ground
local hit,pos,nor = FindPartOnRay(world,ray(Torso.Position,(Torso.Position + Vec3(0,-MaxHeightFromGround,0))-Torso.Position ),{Character,TargetHums[i].Parent})
if hit and hit.CanCollide and (pos-Torso.Position).Magnitude <= MaxHeightFromGround then
--TargetHums[i]:TakeDamage(TargetHums[i].MaxHealth*.5) --shred away half of their total health
PlantIceStalagmite(pos) --warn(TargetHums[i])
end
end
end end --Sounds.Shatter:Play()
end }, --[[ [Enum.KeyCode.E] = { Ready = true, Reload = 15, Function = function()
end }]] }
function IsInTable(Table,Value) for _,v in pairs(Table) do if v == Value then return true end end return false end
function IsTeamMate(Player1, Player2) return (Player1 and Player2 and not Player1.Neutral and not Player2.Neutral and Player1.TeamColor == Player2.TeamColor) end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Services.Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function Activated() if not Tool.Enabled or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health <= 0 then return end Tool.Enabled = false Sounds.Swing:Play() local Anim = {Animations.OverHeadSwing,Animations.LeftSlash} Anim = Anim[Seed:NextInteger(1,#Anim)]:Play() wait(.75) Tool.Enabled = true end
local function HasFinisher(Hum) -- Quick check to see if they're not stunned local Children = Services.ServerScriptService:GetChildren() for i=1, #Children do if Children[i]:IsA("Script") and Children[i].Name == "Finisher" and Children[i]:FindFirstChild("Target") and Children[i]:FindFirstChild("Target").Value == Hum.Parent then return true end end return false end
function Touched(hit,damage) if not hit or not hit.Parent then return end local Hum,FF = hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid"),hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("ForceField") if Hum and Hum ~= Humanoid and Hum.Health > 0 and not FF and not IsTeamMate(Player, Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent)) then UntagHumanoid(Hum) TagHumanoid(Hum,Player) if (Hum.Health/Hum.MaxHealth)*100 <= 25 then if not HasFinisher(Hum) then --Cue the finisher instead local Finisher = script:WaitForChild("Finisher"):Clone() Create("ObjectValue"){ Name = "Target", Value = Hum.Parent, Parent = Finisher } Create("ObjectValue"){ Name = "Creator", Value = Player, Parent = Finisher } Finisher.Parent = Services.ServerScriptService Finisher.Disabled = false end else UntagHumanoid(Hum) TagHumanoid(Hum,Player) Hum:TakeDamage(damage or 0)
end end end
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") Center = Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") or Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health <= 0 or not Character or not Center then return end
Animations = Tool:WaitForChild("Animations") Animations = { OverHeadSwing = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Animations:WaitForChild(Humanoid.RigType.Name):WaitForChild("OverHeadSwing")), LeftSlash = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Animations:WaitForChild(Humanoid.RigType.Name):WaitForChild("LeftSlash")), --RightSlash = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Animations:WaitForChild(Humanoid.RigType.Name):WaitForChild("RightSlash")), Summon = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Animations:WaitForChild(Humanoid.RigType.Name):WaitForChild("Summon")), } Events[#Events+1] = Tool.Activated:Connect(Activated) Events[#Events+1] = Remote.OnServerEvent:Connect(function(client,Key) if not Tool.Enabled or client ~= Player or not Key or Humanoid.Health <= 0 then return end if not Abilities[Key] or not Abilities[Key].Ready then return end Tool.Enabled = false Abilities[Key].Ready = false delay(Abilities[Key].Reload,function() FrostSparkles.Enabled = true Abilities[Key].Ready = true end) Abilities[Key].Function()--Execute the respective ability Tool.Enabled = true end) Events[#Events+1] = Handle.Touched:Connect(function(hit) Touched(hit,14) end) Sounds.Equip:Play() end
function Unequipped() for _,anim in pairs(Animations) do if anim then anim:Stop() end end for _,sound in pairs(Sounds) do if sound then sound:Stop() end end for i=1,#Events do if Events[i] then Events[i]:Disconnect() end end Events = {} end
Tool.Equipped:Connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:Connect(Unequipped)

local Target = script:FindFirstChild("Target") local Creator = script:FindFirstChild("Creator")
local Sounds = { IceCrack = script:WaitForChild("IceCrack"), Shatter = script:WaitForChild("Shatter") }
if not Target or not Creator then script:Destroy() end
Target = Target.Value Creator = Creator.Value
local Torso = Target:FindFirstChild("Torso") or Target:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso")
local Humanoid = Target:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") Humanoid:UnequipTools()
local Stop = false coroutine.wrap(function() repeat Humanoid.JumpPower = 0 Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 game:GetService("RunService").Heartbeat:Wait() until Stop end)()
local Services = { Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), Debris = (game:FindService("Debris") or game:GetService("Debris")), RunService = (game:FindService("RunService") or game:GetService("RunService")), }
function Create(ty) return function(data) local obj = Instance.new(ty) for k, v in pairs(data) do if type(k) == 'number' then v.Parent = obj else obj[k] = v end end return obj end end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Services.Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
if Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target) then local Disable = script:WaitForChild("DisableBackpack") Disable.Parent = Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target):WaitForChild("Backpack") Disable.Disabled = false Services.Debris:AddItem(Disable,1) Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target).CharacterRemoving:Connect(function(Char)--keeps people from a hidden inventory local Enable = script:WaitForChild("EnableBackpack") Enable.Parent = Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target):WaitForChild("Backpack") Enable.Disabled = false Services.Debris:AddItem(Enable,1) end) end
local ice = Create("Part"){ Shape = "Block", Size = Vector3.new(4.2,4,6.3)*0, CanCollide = true, Anchored = true, Locked = true, Name = "Ice Block", CFrame = Torso.CFrame*CFrame.Angles(math.rad(-90),0,0), Transparency = 0.4, Parent = Target, }
local iceBlockMesh = Create("SpecialMesh"){ MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=66876751", TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=66876766", Scale = Vector3.new(1.0, 1.0, 1.0)*0, Parent = ice, }
Sounds.IceCrack.Parent = ice Sounds.IceCrack:Play()
local Puff = script:WaitForChild("Puff") Puff.Parent = ice Puff.Enabled = true
local FrozenParts = {}
for _,parts in pairs(Target:GetChildren()) do if parts:IsA("BasePart") and Humanoid:GetLimb(parts) then parts.Anchored = true FrozenParts[#FrozenParts+1] = parts end end
for i=1,60,1 do ice.Size = (Vector3.new(4.2,4,6.3)*.1):lerp(Vector3.new(4.2,4,6.3),i/60) iceBlockMesh.Scale = (Vector3.new(1.0, 1.0, 1.0)*.1):lerp(Vector3.new(1.0, 1.0, 1.0),i/60) ice.CFrame = Torso.CFrame*CFrame.Angles(math.rad(-90),0,0) Services.RunService.Heartbeat:Wait() end
local Duration,Start = 3,tick()
repeat Services.RunService.Heartbeat:Wait() until (tick()-Start) >= Duration or Humanoid.Health <= 0
Sounds.Shatter.Parent = Torso Sounds.Shatter:Play() Services.Debris:AddItem(Sounds.Shatter,Sounds.Shatter.TimeLength+1)
Stop = true UntagHumanoid(Humanoid) TagHumanoid(Humanoid,Creator) ice:Destroy() Humanoid.JumpPower = 50 Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 Humanoid.Parent:BreakJoints()
local Seed = Random.new(tick())
for _, parts in pairs(FrozenParts) do if parts then parts.Anchored = false local DebrisIce = Create("Part"){ Size = Vector3.new(Seed:NextNumber(1,2),Seed:NextNumber(1,2),Seed:NextNumber(1,2)), Locked = true, Anchored = false, Name = "Broken Ice", CFrame = parts.CFrame, Transparency = 0.3, Material = Enum.Material.Glass, TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, Color = (Seed:NextInteger(1,3) == 1 and Color3.fromRGB(170,255,255)) or Color3.fromRGB(0,170,255), Parent = workspace } Services.Debris:AddItem(DebrisIce,Seed:NextNumber(3,5)) end end
local FrostSparkles = script:WaitForChild("FrostSparkles") FrostSparkles.Parent = Torso FrostSparkles:Emit(FrostSparkles.Rate) Services.Debris:AddItem(FrostSparkles,FrostSparkles.Lifetime.Max)
if Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target) then local Enable = script:WaitForChild("EnableBackpack") Enable.Parent = Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target):WaitForChild("Backpack") Enable.Disabled = false Services.Debris:AddItem(Enable,1) end
wait(2) -- Grace period (Your're Welcome EuroC2)
script:Destroy()

--Much efficient way to hide the backpack without causing lag
local StarterGui = game:GetService("StarterGui")
StarterGui:SetCoreGuiEnabled(Enum.CoreGuiType.Backpack, false)

--Much efficient way to hide the backpack without causing lag
local StarterGui = game:GetService("StarterGui")
StarterGui:SetCoreGuiEnabled(Enum.CoreGuiType.Backpack, true)

Properties.string: Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.

Properties.ProtectedString:
--Plant the Ice Stalagmite and let em' have it!
local Services = { Debris = (game:FindService("Debris") or game:GetService("Debris")), Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), ServerScriptService = (game:FindService("ServerScriptService") or game:GetService("ServerScriptService")) }
local Regions = require(script:WaitForChild("RegionModule"))
local Region,Vec = Region3.new,Vector3.new
local Position,Creator = script:FindFirstChild("Pos"),script:FindFirstChild("Creator")
if not Position or not Creator then script:Destroy() end
Position = Position.Value
Creator = Creator.Value
function IsTeamMate(Player1, Player2) return (Player1 and Player2 and not Player1.Neutral and not Player2.Neutral and Player1.TeamColor == Player2.TeamColor) end
function Create(ty) return function(data) local obj = Instance.new(ty) for k, v in pairs(data) do if type(k) == 'number' then v.Parent = obj else obj[k] = v end end return obj end end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Services.Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function IsInTable(Table,Value) for _,v in pairs(Table) do if v == Value then return true end end return false end
function CastScripts(Duration,ScriptEntries) -- Could be used for ServerScripts, but we'll use LocalScripts in this case local LoggedScripts = {} -- Keeps track of the current scripts local Players = Services.Players:GetPlayers() for p=1,#Players do if Players[p] then for i=1,#ScriptEntries do if ScriptEntries[i] and ScriptEntries[i]:IsA("LocalScript") and Players[p]:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui")then local Clone = ScriptEntries[i]:Clone() Clone.Parent = Players[p]:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") -- The best spot to place it at Clone.Disabled = false LoggedScripts[#LoggedScripts+1] = Clone end end end end
local function Clean() --print("CLEANING") for s=1,#LoggedScripts do
if LoggedScripts[s] then --LoggedScripts[s]:Destroy() Services.Debris:AddItem(LoggedScripts[s],(Duration or 1)+1) end end LoggedScripts = {} -- Clear the Memory end
Clean()
end
wait(.1)--Small time to make an escape
local StatlagmiteClient = script:WaitForChild("StalagmiteClient") local Pos = Instance.new("Vector3Value") Pos.Value = Position Pos.Name = "Pos" Pos.Parent = StatlagmiteClient CastScripts(4,{StatlagmiteClient})
local Parts = Regions.new(CFrame.new(Position) * CFrame.new(0,50,0),Vec(14,100,14)):Cast({Creator}) local TaggedHum = {}
for i=1,#Parts,1 do if Parts[i] and Parts[i].Parent then local Hum,FF = Parts[i].Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid"),Parts[i].Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("ForceField")
if Hum and not FF and not IsTeamMate(Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Creator),Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent)) and not IsInTable(TaggedHum,Hum) then UntagHumanoid(Hum) TagHumanoid(Hum,Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Creator)) Hum:TakeDamage(Hum.MaxHealth*(1/3)) TaggedHum[#TaggedHum+1] = Hum local Chance = Random.new():NextInteger(1,2) --print(Chance) if Hum and Hum.Health ~= 0 and Hum.Parent and Chance == 2 then --warn("Freezing") local Freeze = script:WaitForChild("Freeze"):Clone() Create("ObjectValue"){ Name = "Target", Value = Hum.Parent, Parent = Freeze } Freeze.Parent = Services.ServerScriptService Freeze.Disabled = false end end
end end
script:Destroy()

local Pos = script:FindFirstChild("Pos")
if not Pos then return end
local Vec3,cframe = Vector3.new,CFrame.new
local Services = { Debris = (game:FindService("Debris") or game:GetService("Debris")), tService = (game:FindService("TweenService") or game:GetService("TweenService")), rService = (game:FindService("RunService") or game:GetService("RunService")) }
Pos = Pos.Value
local StalagmiteWidth,StalagmiteHeight = 7,100
function Create(ty) return function(data) local obj = Instance.new(ty) for k, v in pairs(data) do if type(k) == 'number' then v.Parent = obj else obj[k] = v end end return obj end end
local StalagModel = Create("Model"){ Name = "Stalagmite", }
Services.Debris:AddItem(StalagModel,3)
local StalagCorners = {} for i=0,270,90 do local ShatterSound = script:FindFirstChild("ShatterSound") local FrostSparkles = script:FindFirstChild("FrostSparkles") local StalagWedge = Create("CornerWedgePart"){ Anchored = true, Material = Enum.Material.Glass, CanCollide = false, Locked = true, Size = Vec3(StalagmiteWidth,0,StalagmiteWidth), Reflectance = 0, Transparency = .5, Name = "StalagmiteCorner", Color = Color3.fromRGB(9, 137, 207), CFrame = cframe(Pos)*CFrame.Angles(0,math.rad(i),0)*cframe(-StalagmiteWidth*.5,0,StalagmiteWidth*.5), Parent = StalagModel, TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.SmoothNoOutlines, BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.SmoothNoOutlines } if ShatterSound then ShatterSound:Clone().Parent = StalagWedge end if FrostSparkles then FrostSparkles:Clone().Parent = StalagWedge end StalagCorners[#StalagCorners+1] = StalagWedge end
local DeltaInc = 1 local TargetFrameRate = 60
local GoalTime = .1--(TargetFrameRate/10) * .1 local Current_Time = 0
StalagModel.Parent = workspace
for i=1,#StalagCorners,1 do if StalagCorners[i]:FindFirstChildWhichIsA("ParticleEmitter") then StalagCorners[i]:FindFirstChildWhichIsA("ParticleEmitter"):Emit(StalagCorners[i]:FindFirstChildWhichIsA("ParticleEmitter").Rate) end end
local ShatterSound = StalagModel:FindFirstChild("ShatterSound", true) if ShatterSound then ShatterSound:Play() end
repeat
for i=1,#StalagCorners,1 do
if StalagCorners[i] then
StalagCorners[i].Size = Vec3(StalagmiteWidth,(Current_Time/GoalTime)*StalagmiteHeight,StalagmiteWidth) StalagCorners[i].CFrame = cframe(Pos)*(StalagCorners[i].CFrame-StalagCorners[i].CFrame.Position) * cframe(-StalagmiteWidth*.5,StalagCorners[i].Size.Y*.5,StalagmiteWidth*.5) end
end DeltaInc = Services.rService.Heartbeat:Wait() Current_Time = Current_Time + DeltaInc until #StalagCorners <= 0 or Current_Time >= GoalTime
for i=1,#StalagCorners,1 do
if StalagCorners[i] then
StalagCorners[i].Size = Vec3(StalagmiteWidth,StalagmiteHeight,StalagmiteWidth) StalagCorners[i].CFrame = cframe(Pos)*(StalagCorners[i].CFrame-StalagCorners[i].CFrame.Position) * cframe(-StalagmiteWidth*.5,StalagCorners[i].Size.Y*.5,StalagmiteWidth*.5) end
end
wait(.5)
GoalTime = .5 Current_Time = .5 repeat
for i=1,#StalagCorners,1 do
if StalagCorners[i] then
StalagCorners[i].Size = Vec3(StalagmiteWidth,(Current_Time/GoalTime)*StalagmiteHeight,StalagmiteWidth) StalagCorners[i].Transparency = 1-(Current_Time/GoalTime) StalagCorners[i].CFrame = cframe(Pos)*(StalagCorners[i].CFrame-StalagCorners[i].CFrame.Position) * cframe(-StalagmiteWidth*.5,StalagCorners[i].Size.Y*.5,StalagmiteWidth*.5)
end
end DeltaInc = Services.rService.Heartbeat:Wait() Current_Time = Current_Time - DeltaInc until #StalagCorners <= 0 or Current_Time <= 0
for i=1,#StalagCorners,1 do
if StalagCorners[i] then
StalagCorners[i].Size = Vec3(StalagmiteWidth,0,StalagmiteWidth) StalagCorners[i].Transparency = 1 StalagCorners[i].CFrame = cframe(Pos)*(StalagCorners[i].CFrame-StalagCorners[i].CFrame.Position) * cframe(-StalagmiteWidth*.5,StalagCorners[i].Size.Y*.5,StalagmiteWidth*.5) end
end

Properties.string: Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.

Properties.ProtectedString:
local Target = script:WaitForChild("Target").Value
local Sounds = { IceCrack = script:WaitForChild("IceCrack"), Shatter = script:WaitForChild("Shatter") }
local Torso = Target:FindFirstChild("Torso") or Target:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso")
if not Target then script:Destroy() end
local Humanoid = Target:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") Humanoid:UnequipTools()
local Stop = false coroutine.wrap(function() repeat Humanoid.JumpPower = 0 Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 game:GetService("RunService").Heartbeat:Wait() until Stop end)()
local Services = { Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), Debris = (game:FindService("Debris") or game:GetService("Debris")), RunService = (game:FindService("RunService") or game:GetService("RunService")), }
function Create(ty) return function(data) local obj = Instance.new(ty) for k, v in pairs(data) do if type(k) == 'number' then v.Parent = obj else obj[k] = v end end return obj end end
if Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target) then local Disable = script:WaitForChild("DisableBackpack") Disable.Parent = Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target):WaitForChild("Backpack") Disable.Disabled = false Services.Debris:AddItem(Disable,1) Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target).CharacterRemoving:Connect(function(Char)--keeps people from a hidden inventory local Enable = script:WaitForChild("EnableBackpack") Enable.Parent = Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target):WaitForChild("Backpack") Enable.Disabled = false Services.Debris:AddItem(Enable,1) end) end
local ice = Create("Part"){ Shape = "Block", Size = Vector3.new(4.2,4,6.3)*0, CanCollide = true, Anchored = true, Locked = true, Name = "Ice Block", CFrame = Torso.CFrame*CFrame.Angles(math.rad(-90),0,0), Transparency = 0.4, Parent = Target, }
local iceBlockMesh = Create("SpecialMesh"){ MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=66876751", TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=66876766", Scale = Vector3.new(1.0, 1.0, 1.0)*0, Parent = ice, }
Sounds.IceCrack.Parent = ice Sounds.IceCrack:Play()
local Puff = script:WaitForChild("Puff") Puff.Parent = ice Puff.Enabled = true
local FrozenParts = {}
for _,parts in pairs(Target:GetChildren()) do if parts:IsA("BasePart") and Humanoid:GetLimb(parts) then parts.Anchored = true FrozenParts[#FrozenParts+1] = parts end end
for i=1,60,1 do ice.Size = (Vector3.new(4.2,4,6.3)*.1):lerp(Vector3.new(4.2,4,6.3),i/60) iceBlockMesh.Scale = (Vector3.new(1.0, 1.0, 1.0)*.1):lerp(Vector3.new(1.0, 1.0, 1.0),i/60) ice.CFrame = Torso.CFrame*CFrame.Angles(math.rad(-90),0,0) Services.RunService.Heartbeat:Wait() end
local Duration,Start = 5.5,tick()
repeat Services.RunService.Heartbeat:Wait() until (tick()-Start) >= Duration or Humanoid.Health <= 0
Sounds.Shatter.Parent = Torso Sounds.Shatter:Play() Services.Debris:AddItem(Sounds.Shatter,Sounds.Shatter.TimeLength+1)
Stop = true ice:Destroy() Humanoid.JumpPower = 50 Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16
local Seed = Random.new(tick())
for _, parts in pairs(FrozenParts) do if parts then parts.Anchored = false local DebrisIce = Create("Part"){ Size = Vector3.new(Seed:NextNumber(1,2),Seed:NextNumber(1,2),Seed:NextNumber(1,2)), Locked = true, Anchored = false, Name = "Broken Ice", CFrame = parts.CFrame, Transparency = 0.3, Material = Enum.Material.Glass, TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, Color = (Seed:NextInteger(1,3) == 1 and Color3.fromRGB(170,255,255)) or Color3.fromRGB(0,170,255), Parent = workspace } Services.Debris:AddItem(DebrisIce,Seed:NextNumber(3,5)) end end
local FrostSparkles = script:WaitForChild("FrostSparkles") FrostSparkles.Parent = Torso FrostSparkles:Emit(FrostSparkles.Rate) Services.Debris:AddItem(FrostSparkles,FrostSparkles.Lifetime.Max)
if Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target) then local Enable = script:WaitForChild("EnableBackpack") Enable.Parent = Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target):WaitForChild("Backpack") Enable.Disabled = false Services.Debris:AddItem(Enable,1) end
wait(2) -- Grace period (Your're Welcome EuroC2)
script:Destroy()

--Much efficient way to hide the backpack without causing lag
local StarterGui = game:GetService("StarterGui")
StarterGui:SetCoreGuiEnabled(Enum.CoreGuiType.Backpack, false)

--Much efficient way to hide the backpack without causing lag
local StarterGui = game:GetService("StarterGui")
StarterGui:SetCoreGuiEnabled(Enum.CoreGuiType.Backpack, true)

Properties.string: Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.
Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.

Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent
local Remote = Tool:WaitForChild("Remote",10)
--local MouseInput = Tool:WaitForChild("MouseInput")
local Services = { Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), TweenService = (game:FindService("TweenService") or game:GetService("TweenService")), RunService = (game:FindService("RunService") or game:GetService("RunService")), Input = (game:FindService("ContextActionService") or game:GetService("ContextActionService")) }
local Player,Character,Humanoid
function Primary(actionName, inputState, inputObj) if inputState == Enum.UserInputState.Begin then Remote:FireServer(Enum.KeyCode.Q) end end
--[[function Secondary(actionName, inputState, inputObj) if inputState == Enum.UserInputState.Begin then Remote:FireServer(Enum.KeyCode.Q) end end]]
function Equipped() Player = Services.Players.LocalPlayer Character = Player.Character Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") if not Humanoid or not Humanoid.Parent or Humanoid.Health <= 0 then return end Services.Input:BindAction("Primary",Primary,true,Enum.KeyCode.Q,Enum.KeyCode.ButtonX) Services.Input:SetTitle("Primary","Ice Stalagmites") Services.Input:SetPosition("Primary",UDim2.new(.5,0,-.5,0)) --[[Services.Input:BindAction("Secondary",Secondary,true,Enum.KeyCode.E,Enum.KeyCode.ButtonY) Services.Input:SetTitle("Secondary","Blizzard") Services.Input:SetPosition("Secondary",UDim2.new(.5,0,0,0))]] end
function Unequipped() Services.Input:UnbindAction("Primary") --Services.Input:UnbindAction("Secondary")
end
Tool.Equipped:Connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:Connect(Unequipped)
--[[function MouseInput.OnClientInvoke() return game.Players.LocalPlayer:GetMouse().Hit.p end]]

--Rescripted by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:Connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:Connect(OnChanged)
